name: Longest Word Game
description:
What's the longest word you can make in 12 seconds or less ?
Over 150,000 possible words from only 12 letters.
The perfect game to jump start your day !

- This simple game will challenge your mental speed, reflexes and vocabulary!
- Share your words, even the incorrect goofy ones with friends and family !
- Compete with everyone on leaderboards and earn all the achievements (GameCenter) !

How to play:

1) Press the play button to start.
2) You have 12 seconds to form a word from 12 characters. Tap away !
3) When the time runs out, the game ends and your word will be checked.
4) Share your word with family and friends.
5) Repeat !

Good luck and have happy tapping :)
